mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_mentor ( mentor_id, company, mentordate, mentor_Email, STARTDATE, ENDDATE , TITLE, CONTENT, FIELD, BIO, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES(#{mentorId},#{company},#{mentorDate},#{mentorEmail},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{title},#{content}, #{field},#{bio},sysdate,sysdate)
